Key Match Events: Kamoury Doumbia scores on the stroke of halftime
Ernest Nuamah scores for Ghana to equalize
Jordan Ayew scores a late goal in extra time to win the match
Post-Match Reflections: Ghana moves to second place in the table with 6 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: Substitute Jordan Ayew scores the winning goal in extra time
Thomas Partey had a chance to chip the goalkeeper but was saved
